plot outline: The movie is set in the 1990s and follows the life of Manoharan, who is a milk vendor. Due to a tragic turn of events, Manoharan puts his whole family at risk, almost becoming an orphan in the process. This is when he comes to know about a secret, that takes him on a new journey in life.
title: Ponge Ezhu Manohara
plot: The movie is set in the 1990s and follows the life of Manoharan, who is a milk vendor. Due to a tragic turn of events, Manoharan puts his whole family at risk, almost becoming an orphan in the process. This is when he comes to know about a secret, that takes him on a new journey in life.
